title: Os Ausentes
overview: Former delegate Raul Fagnani decides to open an agency to investigate missing persons after the disappearance of Sofia, his five-year-old daughter. In each episode he investigates the fate of one of the title's absentees. But this routine is complicated by the arrival of Maria JÃºlia, a young woman who fled Buenos Aires after her father mysteriously disappeared. Her arrival is like a hurricane in the agency's routine.
